page.title: 17Hazel Threadgold
page.content: {Hazel,}daughter of{Cherry}and{Roy {Threadgold}was born Apr.'82. (see p14) At 2 months she was diagnosed as brain damaged and in Feb.'84 she was taken to the{British Inst. of Brain Injured {Children,}in{Somerset.}This charity provides parents with a programme to stimulate and aid development. The {Braintree and Witham Times}appealled for help for the family and 300 people responded. Fund raising events were organised, donations given and a trust fund set up. The programme began and {Hazel}goes to{Somerset}every 4 months. Now about 170 people come once a fortnight. 3 come to each of 5 daily 90 min. sessions. There have been changes but many of the original helpers still come. Not all are local. Some come from{Yeldham, Earls Colne and{Hatfield Peverel.}It is good that people care and want to help{Hazel.
